title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2013 - Helsinki, Finland
description:
Global Day of Coderetreat 2013 at University of Helsinki, Department of Computer Science. Open for all students of the department. 
For more info seeÂ https://www.cs.helsinki.fi/uutiset/78758

Can you provide a bit more info, please? 
Do we need to register somewhere? Or to announce somehow that we'll come? 
Will the event be organized in English? Unfortunately, I don't know Finnish :( 
I'll be in Helsinki for a while (I'm from Romania) so I'll come to this code retreat :)
Unfortunately the participation will be restrected to the students of University of Helsinki. Language will be Finnish...
What a bummer! I thought the event should be open to everyone who wants to attend... Well, anyway... thanks for your quick response and good luck with the code retreat :)
